thread.title: Delta pilot reports close call with drone
thread.title_full: Delta pilot reports close call with drone

author: Carla Caldwell
title: Delta pilot reports close call with drone
text:
Delta pilot reports close call with drone Aug 3, 2015, 8:06am EDT Industries & Tags Carla Caldwell Morning Edition Editor Atlanta Business Chronicle Carla Caldwell Morning Edition Editor Atlanta Business Chronicle Related Content Byron E. Small A Delta Air Lines Inc. plane fueling up. A pilot for Atlanta-based Delta Air Lines Inc. (NYSE: DAL) reported seeing a drone less than 100 feet from his planeâ€™s right wing as he approached John F. Kennedy International Airport . The incident occurred Friday when flight 407 from Orlando prepared to land, reports ABC-7. The Federal Aviation Administration is investigating, a Delta spokesman told the station. As unmanned recreation drones are becoming more popular, close calls are growing. The FAA reports 25 incidents each month, ABC-7 said. Click here to view the conversation between the pilot and tower recorded by LiveATC.net.
